name: The Dark Side of the Moon (itch) (Maurizuc)
name_original: The Dark Side of the Moon (itch) (Maurizuc)
description:
The Dark Side wants to take control of the moon by making it spin! Plant your defenses and stop this! (How to play is in the game)

Unfortunately i only had around 2 days to work on this and it's probably quite buggy but i'm still happy with what i achieved within this time limit. I hope it's not too scuffed XD
